name: Code Review Pipeline
description: Automated code review workflow with static analysis, security scanning, and AI-powered suggestions. Integrates with GitHub PRs and provides detailed feedback on code quality, patterns, and potential issues.

steps.name: Fetch Pull Request
steps.description: Retrieve PR details, changed files, and diff from GitHub

steps.name: Run Static Analysis
steps.description: Execute linters and static analysis tools on changed files

steps.name: Security Scan
steps.description: Scan for vulnerabilities, secrets, and security anti-patterns

steps.name: AI Code Review
steps.description: Generate intelligent suggestions for code improvements and best practices

steps.name: Post Review Comments
steps.description: Post consolidated review feedback to the PR

name: Content Publishing

steps.name: Draft Content
steps.description: Create or refine content draft with AI assistance

steps.name: SEO Optimization
steps.description: Optimize content for search engines with keyword analysis and meta tags

steps.name: Generate Visual Assets
steps.description: Create accompanying images, thumbnails, and social media graphics

steps.name: Publish to Platform
steps.description: Deploy content to CMS or blog platform

steps.name: Schedule Social Posts
steps.description: Create and schedule social media posts across platforms

steps.name: Setup Analytics
steps.description: Configure tracking and prepare analytics dashboard

name: Data Analysis
description: Comprehensive data analysis workflow from ingestion through visualization. Handles data cleaning, statistical analysis, pattern detection, and automated reporting.

steps.name: Ingest Data Sources
steps.description: Connect to and import data from databases, APIs, or files

steps.name: Clean & Transform
steps.description: Handle missing values, outliers, and data normalization

steps.name: Statistical Analysis
steps.description: Run statistical tests, correlation analysis, and trend detection

steps.name: Pattern Detection
steps.description: Identify anomalies, clusters, and significant patterns

steps.name: Generate Visualizations
steps.description: Create charts, graphs, and interactive dashboards

steps.name: Generate Report
steps.description: Compile findings into actionable report with recommendations

name: Bug Triage
description: Intelligent bug triage system that categorizes, prioritizes, and routes issues. Includes duplicate detection, severity assessment, and automated assignment based on team expertise.

steps.name: Fetch New Issues
steps.description: Retrieve newly reported bugs from issue tracker

steps.name: Detect Duplicates
steps.description: Compare against existing issues to identify duplicates

steps.name: Classify Severity
steps.description: Analyze and assign severity level (critical, high, medium, low)

steps.name: Categorize Issue
steps.description: Tag with appropriate categories and affected components

steps.name: Auto-assign
steps.description: Route to appropriate team member based on expertise and workload

steps.name: Send Notifications
steps.description: Alert assignee and stakeholders via preferred channels

name: Deployment
description: Safe, automated deployment workflow with comprehensive checks. Includes pre-deployment validation, staged rollout, health monitoring, and automatic rollback capabilities.

steps.name: Pre-deployment Checks
steps.description: Verify tests pass, dependencies are ready, and environment is stable

steps.name: Build & Package
steps.description: Compile, build artifacts, and create deployment package

steps.name: Deploy to Staging
steps.description: Deploy to staging environment for validation

steps.name: Run Smoke Tests
steps.description: Execute critical path tests in staging

steps.name: Deploy to Production
steps.description: Gradual rollout to production with canary deployment

steps.name: Monitor Health
steps.description: Track metrics, errors, and performance post-deployment

steps.name: Validate & Stabilize
steps.description: Confirm successful deployment or trigger rollback if issues detected

name: Security Audit
description: Comprehensive security audit workflow covering code, dependencies, infrastructure, and compliance. Generates detailed findings with remediation recommendations and tracks resolution.

steps.name: Code Security Scan
steps.description: Scan codebase for security vulnerabilities and anti-patterns

steps.name: Dependency Audit
steps.description: Check all dependencies for known vulnerabilities and outdated versions

steps.name: Secrets Detection
steps.description: Search for exposed secrets, API keys, and credentials

steps.name: Infrastructure Scan
steps.description: Audit cloud resources, permissions, and network configurations

steps.name: Compliance Check
steps.description: Verify adherence to security standards (SOC2, GDPR, etc.)

steps.name: Prioritize Findings
steps.description: Rank vulnerabilities by severity and exploitability

steps.name: Generate Audit Report
steps.description: Create comprehensive report with remediation roadmap

steps.name: Create Accounts
steps.description: Set up email, directory, and core system accounts

steps.name: Provision Access
steps.description: Grant access to tools, repositories, and resources based on role

steps.name: Hardware Setup
steps.description: Coordinate device assignment and configuration

steps.name: Schedule Training
steps.description: Enroll in required courses and schedule onboarding sessions

steps.name: Assign Onboarding Buddy
steps.description: Match with team member and schedule introduction

steps.name: Deliver Materials

steps.name: Track Completion

steps.name: Collect Feedback

steps.name: Collect Metrics
steps.description: Gather metrics from infrastructure, applications, and services

steps.name: Detect Anomalies
steps.description: Use ML to identify unusual patterns and potential issues

steps.name: Correlate Events
steps.description: Group related events and identify root cause signals

steps.name: Assess Severity
steps.description: Determine impact and urgency of detected issues

steps.name: Route Alerts
steps.description: Send notifications to appropriate team via right channel

steps.name: Create Incident
steps.description: Open incident ticket for critical issues with context

steps.name: Track Resolution
steps.description: Monitor incident progress and update stakeholders

steps.name: Generate Post-mortem
steps.description: Create incident summary with timeline and learnings
